body:
**Is your feature request related to a problem? Please describe.**
rewriting code from pandas into cudf, trying to use `import cudf as pd`

**Describe the solution you'd like**
`cudf.DataFrame.filter` matching https://pandas.pydata.org/docs/reference/api/pandas.DataFrame.filter.html

comments.body: Thanks @mattf for raising this suggestion. It seems like `filter` is something we could implement in the python layer based on our existing libcudf string APIs. Would you please share more about your application? Are you most interested in the `items`, `like` or `regex` parameter?
@GregoryKimball i expect cudf's filter to behave like pandas', order of importance is `like` -> `regex` -> `items`

title: [FEA] cudf.DataFrame.filter
